item.title: Library Support Guidance
item.author: xxuan@mail.ustc.edu.cn (Xuan)
item.description: MathJax A JavaScript display engine for mathematics that works in all browsers.No more setup for readers. It just works. When \(a \ne 0\), there are two solutions to \((ax^2 + bx + c = 0)\) and they are \[x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.\] ChartJS Simple yet flexible JavaScript charting for designers & developers { "type": "bar", "data": { "labels": ["One", "Two", "Three", "Four", "Five", "Six"], "datasets": [{ "label": "# of Votes", "data": [12, 19, 3, 5, 3, 8] }] } } { "type": "line", "data": { "labels": ["One", "Two", "Three", "Four", "Five", "Six"], "datasets": [ { "label": "# of Votes", "data": [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3], "backgroundColor":"transparent", "borderColor":"orange" }, { "label": "Some other set", "data": [15, 8, 13, 5, 5, 9], "backgroundColor":"transparent", "borderColor":"#44ccff" } ] } } FLowChart flowchart.
item.dc:creator: Choi

item.title: Markdown Basic Syntax
item.author: xxuan@mail.ustc.edu.cn (Xuan)
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
item.dc:creator: Choi
